data.actual_result: The close button moves to the middle of the screen and when you move the voice box there it disappears
data.expected_result: The close button should move to the the right hand corner again
data.short_description: Moving voice box on top of close button makes the button move and eventually disappears
data.steps_to_repro: - Launch your game and Discord - Turn on your overlay and join a voice channel - Move your voice box all the way to the right hand corner - Move your voice box all the way to the left hand corner
